request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/notifications/send" 
   -H "Content-Type: application/json" 
   -d '{
   "type": "STATUS",
   "userId": "user123",
   "message": "Your delivery its on its way!"
   }'

response.name: failure - TOO_MANY_REQUESTS / type: STATUS
response.body:
{
    "statusCode": "TOO_MANY_REQUESTS",
    "headers": {},
    "typeMessageCode": "problemDetail.type.com.modak.tc.exceptions.RateLimitExceededException",
    "titleMessageCode": "problemDetail.title.com.modak.tc.exceptions.RateLimitExceededException",
    "detailMessageCode": "problemDetail.com.modak.tc.exceptions.RateLimitExceededException",
    "detailMessageArguments": null,
    "body": {
        "type": "about:blank",
        "title": "Too Many Requests",
        "status": 429,
        "detail": "2025-09-25T14:14:18.169008600 RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED for type: STATUS and user: user123 / retry after 10 seconds.",
        "instance": null,
        "properties": null
    }
}

response.name: failure - NotificationType doesnt exist / type: nonexistant
response.body:
{
    "statusCode": "BAD_REQUEST",
    "headers": {},
    "typeMessageCode": "problemDetail.type.org.springframework.http.converter.HttpMessageNotReadableException",
    "titleMessageCode": "problemDetail.title.org.springframework.http.converter.HttpMessageNotReadableException",
    "detailMessageCode": "problemDetail.org.springframework.http.converter.HttpMessageNotReadableException",
    "detailMessageArguments": null,
    "body": {
        "type": "about:blank",
        "title": "Bad Request",
        "status": 400,
        "detail": "2025-09-25T14:18:11.911519100 CANNOT_DESERIALIZE_VALUE JSON parse error: Cannot deserialize value of type `com.modak.tc.models.enums.NotificationType` from String \"nonexistant\": not one of the values accepted for Enum class: [URGENT, STATUS, NEWS, MARKETING, QUARTER_REPORT, WEEKLY_REPORT]",
        "instance": null,
        "properties": null
    }
}
